verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph לָמָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> why אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God זָנַ֣חְתָּ <S%H2186><s%> why hast thou cast [us] off לָנֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> alway יֶעְשַׁ֥ן <S%H6225><s%> smoke אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <S%H639><s%> anger בְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> against the sheep מַרְעִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4830><s%> flock

זְכֹ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> Remember עֲדָתְךָ֨ ׀ <S%H5712><s%> thy congregation קָ֘נִ֤יתָ <S%H7069><s%> [which] thou hast purchased קֶּ֗דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of old גָּ֭אַלְתָּ <S%H1350><s%> [which] thou hast redeemed שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> the rod נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5159><s%> of thine inheritance הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> this mount צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion זֶ֤ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> this שָׁכַ֬נְתָּ <S%H7931><s%> wherein thou hast dwelt בּֽוֹ׃

הָרִ֣ימָה <S%H7311><s%> Lift up פְ֭עָמֶיךָ <S%H6471><s%> thy feet לְמַשֻּׁא֣וֹת <S%H4876><s%> desolations נֶ֑צַח <S%H5331><s%> unto the perpetual כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everything הֵרַ֖ע <S%H7489><s%> hath done wickedly אוֹיֵ֣ב <S%H341><s%> [even] all [that] the enemy בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> in the sanctuary

שָׁאֲג֣וּ <S%H7580><s%> roar צֹ֭רְרֶיךָ <S%H6887><s%> Thine enemies בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst מוֹעֲדֶ֑ךָ <S%H4150><s%> of thy congregations שָׂ֖מוּ <S%H7760><s%> they set up אוֹתֹתָ֣ם <S%H226><s%> their ensigns אֹתֽוֹת׃ <S%H226><s%> [for] signs

יִ֭וָּדַע <S%H3045><s%> [A man] was famous כְּמֵבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> had lifted לְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> above בִּֽסֲבָךְ־ <S%H5442><s%> upon the thick עֵ֝֗ץ <S%H6086><s%> trees קַרְדֻּמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H7134><s%> axes

[וְעֵת כ] (וְ֭עַתָּה ק) פִּתּוּחֶ֣יהָ <S%H6603><s%> the carved work יָּ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> thereof at once בְּכַשִּׁ֥יל <S%H3781><s%> with axes וְ֝כֵֽילַפֹּ֗ת <S%H3597><s%> and hammers יַהֲלֹמֽוּן׃ <S%H1986><s%> But now they break down

שִׁלְח֣וּ <S%H7971><s%> They have cast בָ֭אֵשׁ <S%H784><s%> fire מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H4720><s%> into thy sanctuary לָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the ground חִלְּל֥וּ <S%H2490><s%> they have defiled מִֽשְׁכַּן־ <S%H4908><s%> [by casting down] the dwelling place שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> of thy name

אָמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> They said בְ֭לִבָּם <S%H3820><s%> in their hearts נִינָ֣ם <S%H3238><s%> Let us destroy יָ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> them together שָׂרְפ֖וּ <S%H8313><s%> they have burned up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מוֹעֲדֵי־ <S%H4150><s%> all the synagogues אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> of God בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

אֽוֹתֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H226><s%> not our signs לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor רָ֫אִ֥ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> We see אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer נָבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> [there is] no more any prophet וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor אִ֝תָּ֗נוּ <S%H854><s%> among יֹדֵ֥עַ <S%H3045><s%> neither [is there] among us any that knoweth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> how long מָֽה׃ <S%H4100><s%> how

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֣י <S%H4970><s%> How אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God יְחָ֣רֶף <S%H2778><s%> reproach צָ֑ר <S%H6862><s%> how long shall the adversary יְנָ֘אֵ֤ץ <S%H5006><s%> blaspheme אוֹיֵ֖ב <S%H341><s%> ? shall the enemy שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> thy name לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> alway

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> Why withdrawest יָ֭דְךָ <S%H3027><s%> thou thy hand וִֽימִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> your right מִקֶּ֖רֶב <S%H7130><s%> [it] out of [חֹוקְךָ כ] (חֵֽיקְךָ֣ <S%H2436><s%> bosom ק) כַלֵּֽה׃ <S%H3615><s%> destroy

וֵ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> For God מַלְכִּ֣י <S%H4428><s%> [is] my King מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of old פֹּעֵ֥ל <S%H6466><s%> working יְ֝שׁוּע֗וֹת <S%H3444><s%> salvation בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> You פוֹרַ֣רְתָּ <S%H6565><s%> Thou didst divide בְעָזְּךָ֣ <S%H5797><s%> by thy strength יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea שִׁבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H7665><s%> thou brakest רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> the heads תַ֝נִּינִ֗ים <S%H8577><s%> of the dragons עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> in the waters

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You רִ֭צַּצְתָּ <S%H7533><s%> Thou brakest רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> the heads לִוְיָתָ֑ן <S%H3882><s%> of leviathan תִּתְּנֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> in pieces [and] gavest מַ֝אֲכָ֗ל <S%H3978><s%> him [to be] meat לְעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> to the people לְצִיִּֽים׃ <S%H6728><s%> inhabiting the wilderness

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You בָ֭קַעְתָּ <S%H1234><s%> Thou didst cleave מַעְיָ֣ן <S%H4599><s%> the fountain וָנָ֑חַל <S%H5158><s%> and the flood אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You ה֝וֹבַ֗שְׁתָּ <S%H3001><s%> thou driedst up נַהֲר֥וֹת <S%H5104><s%> rivers אֵיתָֽן׃ <S%H386><s%> mighty

לְךָ֣ י֭וֹם <S%H3117><s%> The day אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also לְךָ֥ לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> [is] thine the night אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You הֲ֝כִינ֗וֹתָ <S%H3559><s%> also [is] thine thou hast prepared מָא֥וֹר <S%H3974><s%> the light וָשָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> and the sun

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You הִ֭צַּבְתָּ <S%H5324><s%> Thou hast set כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּבוּל֣וֹת <S%H1367><s%> all the borders אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth קַ֥יִץ <S%H7019><s%> summer וָ֝חֹ֗רֶף <S%H2779><s%> and winter אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You יְצַרְתָּם׃ <S%H3335><s%> thou hast made

זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise א֭וֹיֵב <S%H341><s%> this [that] the enemy חֵרֵ֣ף ׀ <S%H2778><s%> hath reproached יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD וְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people נָ֝בָ֗ל <S%H5036><s%> and [that] the foolish נִֽאֲצ֥וּ <S%H5006><s%> have blasphemed שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> thy name

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> O deliver לְ֭חַיַּת <S%H2416><s%> unto the multitude נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> not the soul תּוֹרֶ֑ךָ <S%H8449><s%> of thy turtledove חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> not the congregation עֲ֝נִיֶּ֗יךָ <S%H6041><s%> of thy poor אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <S%H7911><s%> [of the wicked] forget לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> for ever

הַבֵּ֥ט <S%H5027><s%> Have respect לַבְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> unto the covenant כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מָלְא֥וּ <S%H4390><s%> are full מַחֲשַׁכֵּי־ <S%H4285><s%> for the dark אֶ֝֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> places of the earth נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> of the habitations חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> of cruelty

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> return דַּ֣ךְ <S%H1790><s%> O let not the oppressed נִכְלָ֑ם <S%H3637><s%> ashamed עָנִ֥י <S%H6041><s%> let the poor וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy יְֽהַלְל֥וּ <S%H1984><s%> praise שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8034><s%> thy name

קוּמָ֣ה <S%H6965><s%> Arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God רִיבָ֣ה <S%H7378><s%> plead רִיבֶ֑ךָ <S%H7379><s%> thine own cause זְכֹ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> remember חֶרְפָּתְךָ֥ <S%H2781><s%> reproacheth מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> at נָ֝בָ֗ל <S%H5036><s%> how the foolish man כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> thee daily

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֭שְׁכַּח <S%H7911><s%> Forget ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> not the voice צֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <S%H6887><s%> of thine enemies שְׁא֥וֹן <S%H7588><s%> the tumult קָ֝מֶ֗יךָ <S%H6965><s%> of those that rise up עֹלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> against thee increaseth תָמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> continually
